title: Define Project Requirements for SecureCodeRepository (Updated)
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the SecureCodeRepository system. This includes security features such as secret detection, vulnerability scanning, access control mechanisms, data encryption, and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline integration. Additionally, we will define user stories, technical constraints, and ensure compliance with relevant industry standards and regulations, including OWASP and GDPR.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the SecureCodeRepository system, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Implement Version Control System
description: Develop the core version control functionality, including repository management, branching, merging, and commit history.

title: Implement Secret Detection
description: Develop the secret detection feature, which scans code repositories for sensitive information like API keys, passwords, and other secrets.

title: Implement Vulnerability Scanning
description: Develop the vulnerability scanning feature, which analyzes code repositories for known security vulnerabilities and provides remediation recommendations.

title: Design User Interface for SecureCodeRepository System - Revised
description: Revised design of the user interface for the SecureCodeRepository system. This includes repository management, security reporting, and configuration interfaces. The UI will be intuitive, responsive, accessible, adhering to industry best practices and standards. A modular design approach has been considered for future scalability and maintainability. Wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes have been included to facilitate understanding and iterative improvement of the design. Additionally, I would like to suggest the integration of real-time data analysis capabilities, as well as a feature for easy collaboration among team members.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Develop the user interface components based on the approved design, integrating with the backend services.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the SecureCodeRepository system.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including installation guides, usage instructions, and feature explanations.

title: Conduct Security Audits
description: Perform regular security audits on the SecureCodeRepository system to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the quality and security of the SecureCodeRepository system.

title: Conduct Performance and Load Testing
description: Perform performance and load testing on the SecureCodeRepository system to identify and address potential bottlenecks and scalability issues.
